# Rainbow To Screen
<!--
@name: Rainbow To Screen
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
Direct the display of a rainbow to a specific screen
## Parameters

- **index**: The index of the rainbow
- **screen**: The index of the screen to draw the rainbow in.
---
